entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:59 AM AST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cartwright Airport 1:57 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -2.8°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -4.4°C
Wind: NNW 46 km/h gust 78 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Thursday 19 January 2023
